I'm Edward Huang.

C++ • Swift • HTML/CSS • JavaScript • Python

About Me

I was raised in Boston and the Bay Area, but moved to Shanghai for both middle and high school. Currently, I am a sophomore studying computer science at the University of Michigan - Ann Arbor with interests in machine learning and iOS app development. Other than being a coder, I love watching football and playing basketball.

View Resume

Education

Concordia International School Shanghai

High School Diploma• 2014 - 2018

• Road to Recovery: Leader
Road to Recovery is an organization supporting Kang Kang, a 19-year old living in Shanghai who was paralyzed after suffering a fever, through visits to Kang Kang's house, fundraisers, and an annual music performance.

• Varsity Table Tennis: 1x Coach's Choice Player, 2x Most Improved Player

University of Michigan - Ann Arbor

Bachelor of Computer Science• 2018 - 2022

• Michigan Hackers: iOS Core Lead


• M-Lab: Researcher

Work

Full Stack Intern, Wonders Information Company

May 2019 - July 2019

• Developed an online construction project registration flow for clients and a construction project approval system for internal users using HTML/CSS and Javascript for the front-end, and Oracle databases, PL/SQL Developer, and Java as a back-end
• Created mockup designs for a proposed new feature of the registration system using HTML/CSS
• Conducted extensive testing on the construction project registration system to identify bugs
• Languages Used: HTML/CSS, Javascript, Java, SQL

iOS Software Engineer, Rollout Deliveries

July 2018 - September 2018

• Collaborated with other interns to design user interface using Swift programming language
• Facilitated linking of front-end interface to the back-end to create a working app-server connection
• Enhanced communication skills through proposing and synthesizing ideas during team meetings • Languages Used:

Intern, Ruffchain

May 2017 - June 2017

• Conducted research and compiled report on future growth of the “Internet of Things” market in various countries to facilitate future company decisions
• Tested, reviewed, and provided feedback on hardware and software products to improve the user experience
• Translated documents from Mandarin to English to facilitate company in communication to a larger audience
